title: Find out what prison someone is in

details.description: The Prisoner Location Service can help you track down a person you know is in prison
details.more_information:
You must give some personal details so that the prisoner can decide whether or not they want to make contact.

You can contact the Prisoner Location Service by telephone or email.

$C
<prisoner.location.service@noms.gsi.gov.uk>

0121 626 3474  
$C

You can also write to them.

$A
Prisoner Location Service  
PO Box 2152  
Birmingham  
B15 1SD 
$A
details.introduction: If you know someone’s in prison but don't know where they are, the Prisoner Location Service can help you find them. You need to know their full name and date of birth.
